_header: Quant homme deit parleir videat que verba loquatur
Note:
Cf. 3067; lines 13-16 occur in Joannis de Fordun, Scotichronicon (Hearne (1759)
XHearne, Thomas. Johannis de Fordun, Scotichronicon. 2 vols. Oxford: Sheldonian, 1722; Edinburgh, 1759, 2.474).

_description: On the Evils of the Times — thirty-six macaronic lines in Latin, French and English

BodRawA273.First Lines:
Quant homme doit parler videat que verba loquaturReison doit auer
                    ne stultus inueniatur…
BodRawA273.Last Lines:
…God lord almyghten da pacem criste benigneþou myght al
                    fresten fac ne pareamus in igne
